exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing x : K Unable to unify "0" with "AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) x".

In environment H : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 >= r1 K : AbsRing x : K Unable to unify "0 < Rabs ?M2545 \\/ 0 = Rabs ?M2545" with "0 < AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) x \\/ 0 = AbsRing.abs (Ring.Pack K (AbsRing.class K) K) (AbsRing.class K) x".

original: intros x. unfold abs. apply Rle_ge. apply Rabs_pos.
